getDomains

public org.opennaas.extension.idb.serviceinterface.databinding.jaxb.GetDomainsResponseType getDomains(org.opennaas.extension.idb.serviceinterface.databinding.jaxb.GetDomainsType element)
GetDomains Handler.

Handler will accept GetDomains-Requests and return a GetDomain-Response containing a list of DomainInformationTypes with only one element built as follows:
DomainID -> ArgonDomain
Description -> ArgonDomain
ReservationEPR -> Argon.reservation.epr
TopologyEPR -> Argon.topology.epr
TNAPrefixList = List with one TNAPrefix:
-> 0.0.0.0/32

Overrides:
getDomains in class org.opennaas.extension.idb.serviceinterface.topology.CommonTopologyHandler
Parameters:
element - GetDomains Request
Returns:
GetDomains Response
